text: Chat Avenue is a website registered in 2000, making it one of the web's oldest Chat rooms. Originally launched with DigiChat software based on Java, it was subsequently changed and built with 123 Flash Chat, an Adobe Flash-based software for in-browser Chat rooms in October 2005. In 2018, new software was added to the website called Boomcoding Codychat due to browser restrictions and the upcoming end-of-life announcement by Flash.
